sections.heading: and employees; compensation fixed by ordinance
sections.text: The officers and employees in cities of the first class shall receive such compensation as the mayor and city council shall fix by ordinance.SourceLaws 1901, c. 18, ยง 17, p. 234;Laws 1901, c. 19, ยง 1, p. 306;Laws 1903, c. 19, ยง 4, p. 234;Laws 1907, c. 1
